title: Create Media Buy Async Response - Input Required
description: Structure of parts.data in webhook payloads for create_media_buy when status is 'input-required'. Used within A2A StreamResponse statusUpdate.message.parts[].data (DataPart data field). This status indicates that additional input or fixes are required before the operation can proceed (e.g., bid price too low, budget below minimum).

buyer_ref.description: Buyer's reference identifier for the media buy requiring input or fixes. Required for identifying which operation needs attention.

errors.description: Array of error objects explaining what input or fixes are needed

context.description: Application-level context echoed from the request. Opaque correlation data for internal tracking.

examples.description: Input required for bid price adjustment

errors.message: Bid price $2.50 is below the minimum floor of $5.00 for this auction-based product. Please increase bid_price to at least $5.00.
errors.suggestion: Set bid_price to at least $5.00 to participate in the auction
